mapper.insert: insert into bodyshop(bodyshop_no, bodyshop_id, bodyshop_pw, bodyshop_name, bodyshop_address, bodyshop_lat, bodyshop_long) values(#{bodyshop_no},#{bodyshop_id},#{bodyshop_pw},#{bodyshop_name},#{bodyshop_address},#{bodyshop_lat},#{bodyshop_long})
mapper.delete: delete from bodyshop where bodyshop_id=#{bodyshop_id} and bodyshop_pw=#{bodyshop_pw}
mapper.select: select * from bodyshop where bodyshop_address like '%'||#{bodyshop_address}||'%' and bodyshop_name like '%'||#{bodyshop_name}||'%'
